ground_truth.thought: 分析这些政策对中小企业的具体影响
ground_truth.name: EconomicAnalysis.analyze_policy_impact

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'Government.get_tax_reform_announcement', 'description': 'Get the latest government announcement on VAT reform.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of the tax reform announcement'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'announcement', 'description': 'the text of the tax reform announcement'}]}, {'name': 'EconomicAnalysis.analyze_policy_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of a policy on small and medium-sized enterprises.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policy_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of the policy'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'the analysis of the policy impact on SMEs'}]}, {'name': 'TaxAuthority.get_industry_tax_rate', 'description': 'Get the VAT rate for a specific industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry_code', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the industry code'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'tax_rate', 'description': 'the VAT rate for the industry'}]}, {'name': 'ElectronicTaxBureau.get_vat_declaration_guide', 'description': 'Get the guide on how to declare VAT through the electronic tax bureau.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'user_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the user ID'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'declaration_guide', 'description': 'the guide on VAT declaration'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解中国增值税的最新动态。首先，获取最新的关于增值税改革的政府公告。然后，分析这些政策对中小企业的具体影响。接着，查询我所在行业的增值税税率。最后，了解如何通过电子税务局进行增值税的申报。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的关于增值税改革的政府公告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
{'announcement': 'The government has announced a series of reforms to the VAT system, aimed at reducing the burden on small and medium-sized enterprises.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'announcement': 'The government has announced a series of reforms to the VAT system, aimed at reducing the burden on small and medium-sized enterprises.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是获取最新的关于增值税改革的政府公告。
